system.note: If wielder is psychic, can throw up to 2xPsy-Rating Metres. Once per round can Recall it to their hand as Free Action, creatures holding on/impaled make -30 Strength Test or are dragged back to the thrower.

description.value:
Special: Power Field, Witch-Edge

Note: If wielder is psychic, can throw up to 2xPsy-Rating Metres. Once per round can Recall it to their hand as Free Action, creatures holding on/impaled make -30 Strength Test or are dragged back to the thrower.
